long_description: 50 Hikes in Northern Virginia details walks, hikes and backpacking trails from the Allegheny Mountains to Chesapeake Bay. Author: Leonard M. Adkins. Softcover, 296 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Updated edition explores more than 360 miles of pathways with information on trail closures, route changes and new territory. Provides a selection of hikes to suit every degree of physical condition and time constraint. Provides an in-depth exploration of the human and natural histories of the region and how each relates to the other. Trail-specific information includes narratives, trail distances, hiking times, vertical rises and pertinent maps. The Countryman Press; third edition, copyright 2006.
short_description: 50 Hikes in Northern Virginia details walks, hikes and backpacking trails from the Allegheny Mountains to Chesapeake Bay.
